1: -module(xep_0352_csi_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile([export_all]).
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:     [{group, basic}].
    9: 
   10: 
   11: groups() ->
   12:     [{basic,
   13:       [parallel, shuffle],
   14:       all_tests()
   15:      }].
   16: 
   17: all_tests() ->
   18:     [
   19:      server_announces_csi,
   20:      alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived,
   21:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate,
   22:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order,
   23:      bob_does_not_get_msgs_from_inactive_alice,
   24:      bob_gets_msgs_from_aclie_after_she_is_active_back,
   25:      bob_and_alice_get_msgs_from_each_other_after_alice_is_active,
   26:      alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack_after_active
   27:     ].
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     escalus:suite().
   31: 
   32: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   33:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   34: 
   35: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   36:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
   37:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   38: 
   39: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   40:     escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, stream_management, true).
   41: 
   42: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   43:     Config.
   44: 
   45: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   46:     timer:sleep(random:uniform(2000)),
   47:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   48: 
   49: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   50:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   51: 
   52: server_announces_csi(Config) ->
   53:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}]),
   54:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
   55:     Steps = [start_stream,
   56:              stream_features,
   57:              maybe_use_ssl,
   58:              maybe_use_compression,
   59:              authenticate,
   60:              bind,
   61:              session],
   62:     {ok, _Client, _Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
   63:     true = proplists:get_value(client_state_indication, Features).
   64: 
   65: alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived(Config) ->
   66:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   67:         given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 1),
   68: 
   69:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
   70:     end).
   71: 
   72: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config) ->
   73:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 1).
   74: 
   75: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order(Config) ->
   76:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 3).
   77: 
   78: 
   79: 
   80: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, N) ->
   81:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   82:         %%Given
   83:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
   84: 
   85:         %%When client becomes active again
   86:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   87: 
   88:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs)
   89:     end).
   90: 
   91: 
   92: bob_does_not_get_msgs_from_inactive_alice(Config) ->
   93:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   94:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, 1),
   95: 
   96:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
   97:     end).
   98: 
   99: bob_gets_msgs_from_aclie_after_she_is_active_back(Config) ->
  100:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  101:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 1),
  102: 
  103:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob">>)),
  104: 
  105:         %%When client becomes active again
  106:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
  107: 
  108:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs),
  109:         then_client_receives_message(Bob, [<<"Hi, Bob">>])
  110:     end).
  111: 
  112: bob_and_alice_get_msgs_from_each_other_after_alice_is_active(Config) ->
  113:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  114:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, 1),
  115:         {_MsgsToAlice, MsgsToBob} = Msgs,
  116:         %%When client becomes active again
  117:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
  118: 
  119:         then_client_receives_message(Bob, MsgsToBob)
  120:     end).
  121: 
  122: alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack_after_active(Config) ->
  123:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice,1}], fun(Alice) ->
  124:         given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  125: 
  126:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  127: 
  128:         timer:sleep(1000),
  129:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  130: 
  131:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
  132:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  133: 
  134:     end).
  135: 
  136: given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  137:     %%Given
  138:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
  139: 
  140:     MsgsToBob = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Bob">>, N),
  141:     send_msgs(Alice, Bob, MsgsToBob),
  142:     timer:sleep(1),
  143:     {MsgsToAlice, MsgsToBob}.
  144: 
  145: 
  146: then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs) ->
  147:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)) ||
  148:      Msg <- Msgs].
  149: 
  150: 
  151: given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  152:     %%Given
  153:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  154: 
  155:     timer:sleep(1000),
  156: 
  157:     %%When
  158:     Msgs = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Alice">>, N),
  159:     send_msgs(Bob, Alice, Msgs),
  160:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  161:     Msgs.
  162: 
  163: send_msgs(From, To, Msgs) ->
  164:     [escalus:send(From, escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, Msg)) ||
  165:      Msg <- Msgs].
  166: 
  167: 
  168: gen_msgs(Prefix, N) ->
  169:     [<<Prefix/binary, (integer_to_binary(I))/binary>> || I <- lists:seq(1, N)].
  170: 
  171: given_client_is_inactive(Alice) ->
  172:     escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"inactive">>)).
  173: 
  174: 
  175: csi_stanza(Name) ->
  176:     #xmlel{name = Name,
  177:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:csi:0">>}]}.
  178:
